definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 48:8 level place, uprightness;—´[[מ]] Ps 27:11 + 9 t.; [[מִישׁׂר]] Zec 4:7 (v. Baer) + 12 t.;—

level country, table-land, plain: antith. ([[ים]])[[הר]] 1Ki 20:23, 1Ki 20:25, Zec 4:7; [[עָקׂב]] Is 40:4 [[מַעֲקַשִּׁים]] Is 42:16 + [[שְׁפֵלָה]] 2Ch 26:10; ‖[[עֵמֶק]] Je 21:13; [[הַמִּישׁוֹר]] specifically of the elevated plateau or table-land between the Arnon and Heshbon De 3:10, De 4:43, Jos 13:9, Jos 13:16, Jos 13:17, Jos 13:21, Jos 20:8, Je 48:8, Je 48:21.
level place (free from obstacles), fig. for place of safety, comfort, and prosperity Ps 26:12; ´[[ארח מ]] Ps 27:11 ´[[אֶרֶץ מ]] Ps 143:10.
